Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold
direct costs of leased and rented property or equipment

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
net income loss available to common stockholders basic

Other Income (Expense): gain loss on foreign currency derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments
gain loss on interest rate derivative instruments other income expense
gains losses on extinguishment of debt

Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax
other comprehensive income loss net of tax
other comprehensive income loss reclassification adjustment from a o c i on derivatives net of tax
other comprehensive income unrealized gain loss on derivatives arising during period net of tax
other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period net of tax

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
discontinued operation gain loss on disposal of discontinued operation net of tax
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation net of tax per basic share
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
